00055     Node::Node(const String& Name, SceneManager* manager)
00056     {
00057         Manager = manager;
00058         OgreNode = Manager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->createSceneNode(Name);
00059         Type = Node::Free;
00060     }
00061 
00062     Node::Node(Ogre::SceneNode* snode, SceneManager* manager)
00063     {
00064         OgreNode = snode;
00065         Manager = manager;
00066         Type = Node::Free;
00067     }
00068 
00069     Node::~Node()
00070     {
00071         Manager->GetGraphicsWorldPointer()->destroySceneNode(OgreNode);
00072     }
00073 
00074     ConstString& Node::GetName()
00075     {
00076         return OgreNode->getName();
00077     }
00078 
00079     void Node::AttachElement(Attachable* Element)
00080     {
00081         Attachable::AttachableElement Type = Element->GetElementType();
00082         switch (Type)
00083         {
00084             case Attachable::ParticleEffect:
00085             {
00086                 ParticleEffect* particle = static_cast< ParticleEffect* > (Element);
00087                 OgreNode->addChild(particle->OgreNode);
00088                 //OgreNode->attachObject(particle->OgreParticle);
00089             }
00090             break;
00091             case Attachable::Camera:
00092             {
00093                 Camera* camera = static_cast< Camera* > (Element);
00094                 OgreNode->attachObject(camera->Cam);
00095             }
00096             break;
00097             case Attachable::Light:
00098             {
00099                 Light* light = static_cast< Light* > (Element);
00100                 OgreNode->attachObject(light->OgreLight);
00101             }
00102             break;
00103             default:
00104                 return;
00105         }
00106         Elements.push_back(Element);
00107         return;
00108     }
00109 
00110     void Node::DetachElement(Attachable* Element)
00111     {
00112         Attachable::AttachableElement Type = Element->GetElementType();
00113         switch (Type)
00114         {
00115             case Attachable::ParticleEffect:
00116             {
00117                 ParticleEffect* particle = static_cast< ParticleEffect* > (Element);
00118                 OgreNode->detachObject(particle->OgreParticle);
00119             }
00120             break;
00121             case Attachable::Camera:
00122             {
00123                 Camera* camera = static_cast< Camera* > (Element);
00124                 OgreNode->detachObject(camera->Cam);
00125             }
00126             break;
00127             case Attachable::Light:
00128             {
00129                 Light* light = static_cast< Light* > (Element);
00130                 OgreNode->detachObject(light->OgreLight);
00131             }
00132             break;
00133             default:
00134                 return;
00135         }
00136         for( std::vector< Attachable* >::iterator it = Elements.begin() ; it != Elements.end() ; it++ )
00137         {
00138             if( Element == (*it) )
00139             {
00140                 Elements.erase(it);
00141                 return;
00142             }
00143         }
00144         return;
00145     }
00146 
00147     void Node::DetachAllElements()
00148     {
00149         OgreNode->detachAllObjects();
00150         Elements.clear();
00151     }
00152 
00153     Whole Node::GetNumAttachedElements()
00154     {
00155         return Elements.size();
00156     }

00158     void Node::SetPosition(Vector3 Position)
00159     {
00160         OgreNode->setPosition(Position.GetOgreVector3());
00161     }
00162 
00163     Vector3 Node::GetPosition()
00164     {
00165         Vector3 Pos(OgreNode->getPosition());
00166         return Pos;
00167     }

00169     void Node::SetOrientation(Quaternion Orientation)
00170     {
00171         OgreNode->setOrientation(Orientation.GetOgreQuaternion());
00172     }
00173 
00174     Quaternion Node::GetOrientation()
00175     {
00176         Quaternion Ori(OgreNode->getOrientation());
00177         return Ori;
00178     }
00179 
00180     void Node::LookAt(Vector3 LookAt)
00181     {
00182         OgreNode->lookAt(LookAt.GetOgreVector3(), Ogre::Node::TS_WORLD);
00183     }
00184 
00185     void Node::SetAutoTracking(Node* node, Vector3 Offset)
00186     {
00187         OgreNode->setAutoTracking(true, node->OgreNode, Ogre::Vector3::NEGATIVE_UNIT_Z, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00188     }
00189 
00190     void Node::SetAutoTracking(ActorBase* Actor, Vector3 Offset)
00191     {
00192         OgreNode->setAutoTracking(true, Actor->node, Ogre::Vector3::NEGATIVE_UNIT_Z, Offset.GetOgreVector3());
00193     }
00194 
00195     void Node::DisableAutoTracking()
00196     {
00197         OgreNode->setAutoTracking(false);
00198     }
00199 
00200     void Node::IncrementOrbit(Real Radians)
00201     {
00202         if( Node::Orbit == this->Type )
00203         {
00204             Ogre::Radian Rad(Radians);
00205             OgreNode->getParentSceneNode()->yaw(Rad);
00206         }
00207     }
00208 
00209     void Node::SetType(Node::NodeType type)
00210     {
00211         Type = type;
00212     }
00213 
00214     Node::NodeType Node::GetType()
00215     {
00216         return Type;
00217     }
